law.catch_line: A majority of the members currently serving on the Board, with at least 1 member of each profession ...

text.section: A majority of the members currently serving on the Board, with at least 1 member of each profession regulated under the provisions of this title being present, is a quorum to do business.
The Board shall meet at least once a year, at the times and places that it determines.

In accordance with the budget of the Board, each member of the Board is entitled to:
Compensation, at a rate determined by the Board, for each day on which the member is engaged in the duties of the member's office; and
Reimbursement for expenses at a rate determined by the Board.
The Board may employ a staff in accordance with the budget of the Board.

The Board shall appoint an executive director who:
Shall serve at the pleasure of the Board;
Is the executive officer of the Board; and
Has the powers and duties assigned by the Board.
